ygData.subject: RE: testeqnews.txt (Quasimeta)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually if its the quest I m thinking of we tried to abort it on E ci on purpose!  If the so called daughter of Innouruk were wandering thru your lands and
ygData.messageBody:
Actually if its the quest I'm thinking of we tried to abort it on E'ci on
purpose! If the so called daughter of Innouruk were wandering thru your
lands and you were good wouldn't you try to kill her? Well we did, but
unfortuantely there were two many dark elf cleric pc's about and she lived.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Monday, September 27, 1999 1:29 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] testeqnews.txt (Quasimeta)


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

At 11:53 AM 9/27/99 -0400, you wrote:
>
>I'm curious though what would happen if you had about a dozen
>L50 bards continuously Pixie Striking Nagafen to interrupt his
>spells. :-)

Then verant would nerf pixie strike to only work on level 10 mobs or lower.

:( Not happy about their solutions. I also heard that over the weekend
they held an aborted quest on Bristlebane. Aborted because someone killed
"the important NPC". I mean, how stupid does Verant have to be to not
concieve that some player will try to kill their NPC "just because"????

*mutters*
Talies
